titles.title: Expressing the sense of Congress relating to a free trade agreement between the United States and Taiwan.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 2/15/2006--Introduced. Calls for the President to make the conclusion of a free trade agreement with Taiwan one of the top U.S. priorities when initiating bilateral free trade agreements with foreign countries and to instruct the U.S. Trade Representative to expedite negotiations on such an agreement.
